alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Chilton, northeastern Perry and southeastern Bibb Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chilton County Motor Sports Park, or 8 miles west of Jemison, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maplesville, Billingsley, Plecher, Lawley, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Parnell, Talladega National Forest, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Randolph, Trio, Stanton, Oakmulgee and Isabella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
